糟.definition: dregs; draff; pickled in wine; rotten; messy; ruined

糟粕.definition: dross; dregs; rubbish; fig. useless residue

糟糕.definition: too bad; how terrible; what bad luck; terrible; bad

糟糠.definition: chaff, husks, distillers' dregs etc (food eaten by the poor); (fig.) rubbish; junk; (abbr. for 糟糠妻[zao1 kang1 qi1]) wife who goes through the hardships of poverty with her husband

糟糠妻.definition: wife who goes through the hardships of poverty with her husband

糟踐.definition: to waste; to spoil; to destroy; to insult grievously

糟蹋.definition: to waste; to spoil; to ruin; to wreck; to insult; to humiliate; to defile (a woman); to rape; also pr. [zao1ta5]

糟透.definition: in a bad state; horrible; dreadful; entirely regrettable
